title: League of legends Delay
body:
I have this problem in game that just started happening with the new windows 10 update around 10 days ago and I cant fix it. League of legends is reacting slowly to my commands. For examples, I play on unlocked screen so when I move my cursor to the corner of my screen there is this small delay before my screen will actually move in the direction I played my cursor on. When I use an ability there is also a small delay

When I say small delay, its like a 0.2 second delay. It might not be much, however, it is very noticable. I only started having there problems after the new windows 10 update and I was wondering if anyone has heard of this problem before and if there is a fix. 

I also already play on the lowest settings to reduce lag.

Whether I use abilities or AA I have this annoying delay. Even when I try to scroll through the options menu in game there is a delay

replies.body: There was a windows 10 update recently that's been causing issues for some players when it auto enabled the [Xbox Game Bar](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html).  Try disabling that as your first step to get this fixed.  If it continues, I recommend going over our [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide to make sure your drivers and settings are tuned up for smooth play.  Hope that helps!
